title: FS 1911 T201 Mecca Double Folder McGINNITY/McCARTY
author: mighty bombjack

posts.post_title: FS 1911 T201 Mecca Double Folder McGINNITY/McCARTY
posts.post_content:
I found this among my old purchases, bought probably 20 years ago, and I could use some money for other expenditures. It is not graded, and I am not experienced in that realm so have no guess as to what it would grade out. Check scans - tops corners look good, bottom not so much (makes sense as the top ones were folded down).

I really don't have a great grasp for what this is worth, so I'm asking $85 shipped OBO. Feel free to send offers.
